.. _`Troubleshooting`:

Troubleshooting
===============
This section describes some common issues that can arise and possible solutions.

Issue #1
--------
Branches having conflicts.
Solution: Stash changes from one branch and push the other. Then, go back and 

Issue #2
--------
Git not pushing changes.
Be sure to input git push --set-upstream origin <branchname>


Issue #3
--------
New changes not appearing locally.
Be sure to sync changes within the fork, and then pull those changes to your local repository's main branch before checking out a new branch.
